name: Reactive StocKonomy
tagline: Minecraft Bukkit Plugin for Stocks and Economy without Vault in one package
body:
# Welcome to Reactive StocKonomy's Official Site.
> A [Minecraft](https://minecraft.net/) [Bukkit](https://dl.bukkit.org/‎) Plugin

This [Minecraft](https://minecraft.net/) [Bukkit](https://dl.bukkit.org/‎) Plugin is meant to improve a server's feel by adding an Economy and a Stock Market Plugin that isn't going to be abandoned. The best part is it can be independent.

## Contributing
To best help our project, contribute
To contribute just...
```
$ cd (the folder to hold your code)
$ git clone https://github.com/Spartan322/Reactive-StocKonomy.git
$ git add --all (when you are done messing with the code)
$ git commit -m "[name]" (the name is what you should call the commit)
$ git push (to push back to the Github)

```
Use your Username and password to put it in a fork then when your are done just pull to the Main one from Github itself

### Rules to Contributing
* Please use organized code.
* Use only Eclipse's Wrap. Github is not as great
* Eclipse would be the best idea
* Please keep the functions, variables, and imports organized
* Keep Files short for easier read (150 lines is pretty long if you can shorten it it would be great)

##Todo List
- Add Basic Economy
- Add Basic Stock Market onto Economy
- Create Updatability for Signs linked to an Economy
- Create Stock Building (Market Street)
- Add Multiple Enum based Stock types
- More Stuff to Plan


## Current Bugs
- Currently Unknown


## Current Authors and Contributors
- Main Programer: George @Spartan322

## Support or Contact
If errors occur please contact Spartan322@live.com or add to our issues tab on github. If your server crashes or breaks due to this plugin no one is held responsible but we will try to help if we can. Please Backup your server before trusting this plugin. This is Alpha so there may be bugs.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
